poemsDataJson.list_full: 滝(たき)の音(おと)は 絶(た)えて久(ひさ)しく なりぬれど 名(な)こそ流(なが)れて なほ聞(き)こえけれ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Though the waterfall//Ceased its flowing long ago,//And its sound is stilled,//Yet, in name it ever flows,//And in fame may yet be heard.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Taki no oto wa|Taete hisashiku|Nari nuredo|Na koso nagarete|Nao kikoe kere
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: なこそなかれて なほきこえけれ
poemsDataJson.author: 大納言公任(だいなごんきんとう)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 水が涸れて久しい滝の今もなお伝わる名声への賛美
